question: What is the theme of United Nations' (UN) World Day of Social Justice-2017?
option3: A Just Transition - environmentally sustainable economies and societies
option4: Preventing conflict and sustaining peace through decent work
answer: Preventing conflict and sustaining peace through decent work
explanation: The World Day of Social Justice is observed every year on February 20 to recognize the need to promote efforts to tackle issues such as poverty, exclusion and unemployment. The 2017 theme is “Preventing conflict and sustaining peace through decent work”.
